I

initialize(Scene) - Static method in class com.aeonium.javafx.utils.LabelService
Initialize the labels in the given scene, i.e.,: find all labels in the scene, loop over the list of found labels and check for a 'Label for'-reference, and, if found, put it in the internal map, set cursor style and add a click handler that lets the user focus the node by clicking it's label.
initialize(Parent) - Static method in class com.aeonium.javafx.utils.LabelService
Initialize all labels that are registered as label for a node.
initialize(Parent, Object) - Static method in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.ValidatorService
The convenient way to initialize the node tree and the controller.
initialize(Object) - Static method in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.ValidatorService
Initialize validation in the given controller object.
initializeActionManager(FXActionManager) - Static method in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.ValidatorService
Use this method if you have already an instance of FXActionManager and you want to initialize it for using aeFXValidation annotations.
initializeCheckedControls(List<Control>, List<Control>) - Static method in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.ValidatorService
Iterate through a list of "checked" controls, i.e., of controls that have to be controlled by the validation service: their disable property gets bound to the combined result of all validation constraints.
initializeCheckedProperties(List<BooleanProperty>, List<Control>) - Static method in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.ValidatorService
Initialize checked boolean properties, i.e., bind their value to the combined result of all validation constraints.
isValid - Variable in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.FXAbstractValidator
Property for the state of validation - initially, it needs to be set to false.
isValidProperty() - Method in class com.aeonium.javafx.validation.FXAbstractValidator
Gets the value of the property validProperty.
